wikipedia_page.main: Tom Farrell (born 23 March 1991) is an English long-distance runner. He represented his country at the 2015 World Championships in Athletics and 2016 IAAF World Indoor Championships. Both his parents are former athletes. His father David was a steeplechaser and his mother Jennifer Little was a high jumper.
